repositories.author: arthenica
repositories.name: ffmpeg-kit
repositories.description: FFmpeg Kit for applications. Supports Android, Flutter, iOS, Linux, macOS, React Native and tvOS. Supersedes MobileFFmpeg, flutter_ffmpeg and react-native-ffmpeg.

repositories.author: zephyrproject-rtos
repositories.name: zephyr
repositories.description: Primary Git Repository for the Zephyr Project. Zephyr is a new generation, scalable, optimized, secure RTOS for multiple hardware architectures.

repositories.author: git
repositories.name: git
repositories.description: Git Source Code Mirror - This is a publish-only repository but pull requests can be turned into patches to the mailing list via GitGitGadget (https://gitgitgadget.github.io/). Please follow Documentation/SubmittingPatches procedure for any of your improvements.

repositories.author: nanopb
repositories.name: nanopb
repositories.description: Protocol Buffers with small code size

repositories.author: Genymobile
repositories.name: scrcpy
repositories.description: Display and control your Android device

repositories.author: taosdata
repositories.name: TDengine
repositories.description: High-performance, scalable time-series database designed for Industrial IoT (IIoT) scenarios

repositories.author: redis
repositories.name: redis
repositories.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. The data model is key-value, but many different kind of values are supported: Strings, Lists, Sets, Sorted Sets, Hashes, Streams, HyperLogLogs, Bitmaps.

repositories.author: valkey-io
repositories.name: valkey
repositories.description: A flexible distributed key-value datastore that is optimized for caching and other realtime workloads.

repositories.author: lvgl
repositories.name: lvgl
repositories.description: Embedded graphics library to create beautiful UIs for any MCU, MPU and display type.

repositories.author: pocoproject
repositories.name: poco
repositories.description: The POCO C++ Libraries are powerful cross-platform C++ libraries for building network- and internet-based applications that run on desktop, server, mobile, IoT, and embedded systems.

repositories.author: curl
repositories.name: curl
repositories.description: A command line tool and library for transferring data with URL syntax, supporting DICT, FILE, FTP, FTPS, GOPHER, GOPHERS, HTTP, HTTPS, IMAP, IMAPS, LDAP, LDAPS, MQTT, POP3, POP3S, RTMP, RTMPS, RTSP, SCP, SFTP, SMB, SMBS, SMTP, SMTPS, TELNET, TFTP, WS and WSS. libcurl offers a myriad of powerful features
